titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Commercial Telegraphers Union Notes and Correspondence on Negotiations with Western Union WAG.266

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-03 12:08:13 -0400.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.unittitle: Commercial Telegraphers Union Notes and Correspondence on Negotiations with Western Union

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes notebooks, contracts, correspondence, and other documents concerning the Commercial Telegraphers Union's negotiations with Western Union in the late 1940s.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The provenance of this collection is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.046.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1946-1949, are expected to enter the public domain in 2070.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Commercial Telegraphers Union Notes and Correspondence on Negotiations with Western Union; WAG 266; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
